name: gestio
description: ## Description Base project for (all) web projects. The projects include the use of npm and bower. As a build system I use gulp.js. And for simpler CSS writing sass is used. CSS Reset is on. Basic SCSS fragments are provided. Further included are some basic base line grid systems. *Editorconfig* for sublime Text and *gitignore* are included as well. *Jquery library* is installed by default.
author: Jonas Scheiwiller
